## rxWriteJsonFile() function

Persist a JSON file

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rxWriteJsonFile(aName: string, aValue: any, aHost: WriteTextFile): Observable<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aName | <code>string</code> | name of the file |
|  aValue | <code>any</code> | value of the file |
|  aHost | <code>WriteTextFile</code> | host that can write text files |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Observable<string>`

the name of the file
